gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 125, Nets 114
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers closed the game on a 22-0 run and completed an 18-point fourth quarter comeback and defeated the Nets, 125-114. James Harden led the way with 24 points, 10 assists, and five rebounds for the Clippers, with Russell Westbrook (23 points, nine rebounds) and Kawhi Leonard (21 points, four assists) combining for 44 points in the victory. Mikal Bridges tallied 26 points, six rebounds, and five assists for the Nets in the losing effort. The Clippers improve to 27-14, while the Nets fall to 17-25.
